name: Secret of the Magic Dynasty
description:
Welcome to our school prototyping.

After having studied programming, design and management at the School of Games in Cologne for almost one year, the students have been asked to pour all of what they learned into these projects and create, show and market their own take on a random generated game name.

Who is involved:

Anna Hebborn, Charlini Topoulos, Kevin Homeier, Marc Schuster, Maurice Marx, Niclas Arenz and Dominik Schwarz

Game description:

"Secret of the Magic Dynasty" is an uncompromising mystical game full of magical environments and its unique story.

 You wake up as a "guardian spirit" in a deep forest not knowing who you are and what your task is.  You feel a strong urge to retrieve something that belongs to you, but you can't remember what it is, so you depart on a dangerous journey through the woods. During your exploration you gain new powers that you'll need to advance further in the treacherous forest to finally arrive at your urge's destination and find out who you really are!

You'll have to jump a lot, so make sure you land on both feet again!

Key features:

  • Awake your hidden powers 

Achieve different types of power ups that help you for your journey through the deep forest.

  • Magical and remarkable visuals:

Experience the hand drawn 2D graphics and heartwarming story elements.

  • Remember your true identity.

Recollect your missing memories and true purpose.
